title: Earn2Trade 60% OFF
description: Earn2Trade, based in the United States and established in January 2016, is a futures prop trading firm offering a 1 Step program. Supported platforms include NinjaTrader, Quantower, Rithmic, and many others via Rithmic connection. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Trading in manner not aligning with actual market practices.
Unrealistic Trading Volume: excessive contracts in a single day prohibited.
Maximum withdrawal from LiveSim account is $4

payout_policy.processing_time: Weekly on Tuesdays (Withdrawal email by Friday 2 PM).
payout_policy.details: 80% profit split. One-time activation fee ($139) for LiveSim non-professional status. Max withdrawal from LiveSim is $4,000. For TCP: reach 1% buffer then move to live brokerage.

firm_rules.inactivity_rule: Affected after 5 consecutive trading days of inactivity.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Not allowed. All positions/orders must be closed by 3:50 PM CT to 5:00 PM CT daily.
forbidden_strategies: Trading in manner not aligning with actual market practices.
Unrealistic Trading Volume: excessive contracts in a single day prohibited.
Maximum withdrawal from LiveSim account is $4

Earn2Trade Technical Infrastructure

Earn2Trade, based in the United States and established in January 2016, is a futures prop trading firm offering a 1 Step program. Supported platforms include NinjaTrader, Quantower, Rithmic, and many others via Rithmic connection. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
